title: Citation
description: A reference to a `CreativeWork` that is cited in another `CreativeWork`.
$comment:
A `Citation` node is used within a [`CreativeWork`](./CreativeWork), usually an
[`Article`](./Article), to refer to an other `CreativeWork`.
Often a `Citation` will be associated with other citations, in a `CitationGroup`.

type.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@type` keyword.

id.$comment: This is a special property analogous to JSON-LD's `@id` keyword.

target.description: The target of the citation (URL or reference ID).

compilationMessages.description: Messages generated while resolving the target if the citation.

cites.description: The `Reference` being cited, resolved from the `target`.

citationMode.description: Determines how the citation is shown within the surrounding text.

citationIntent.description: The type/s of the citation, both factually and rhetorically.

content.description: Optional structured content/text of this citation.

pageStart.description: The page on which the work starts; for example "135" or "xiii".

pageEnd.description: The page on which the work ends; for example "138" or "xvi".

pagination.description: Any description of pages that is not separated into pageStart and pageEnd; for example, "1-6, 9, 55".

citationPrefix.description: Text to show before the citation.
citationPrefix.$comment:
Previously this was name `prefix` but for consistency with `citationMode`
and `honorificPrefix`, to avoid ambiguity with other prefixes was renamed
to `citationPrefix`.

citationSuffix.description: Text to show after the citation.
